title: Leave 'em laughing
creator_credit: Jackie Cooper, Julian Fowles and Charles Fries Productions
brief_description: This made for television drama based on the life story of the much-loved Chicago circus clown, Jack Thum, stars Mickey Rooney in one of his most poignant and memorable roles along with Anne Jackson as Shirlee, Thum’s loving and devoted wife. Cast also includes Allen Goorwitz, Elisha Cook, Michael Le Clair, William Windom, Red Buttons.
